<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_362</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_362</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Límites de funciones</string>
            <string language="en">Limits of functions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Begrenzungen auf Funktionen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Limites des fonctions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Limites das funções</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Limiti delle funzioni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Όρια των λειτουργιών</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el concepto de límite de una función en un punto y en el infinito. Se establecen las definiciones formales de los límites y se estudian gráficamente, diversos ejemplos.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to study the concept of limit of a function at a point and at infinity. The formal definitions of limits are presented and several graphical examples are studied.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">asíntota</string>
            <string language="en">asymptote</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">infinito</string>
            <string language="en">infinite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">límite</string>
            <string language="en">limit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">límite lateral</string>
            <string language="en">one-sided limit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">continuidad</string>
            <string language="en">continuity</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, das Konzept der Begrenzung auf eine Funktion an einem 
Punkt und an der Unbegrenztheit zu studieren. Die formalen 
Definitionen von Begrenzungen werden dargestellt und einige graphische
Beispiele werden studiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'étudier le concept de la limite d'une fonction à un 
point et à l'infini. Les définitions formelles des limites 
sont présentées et plusieurs exemples graphiques sont étudiés.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações estudar o
conceito do limite de uma função em um ponto e na infinidade. 
As definições formais dos limites são apresentadas e diversos
exemplos gráficos são estudados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
studiare il concetto del limite di una funzione ad un punto ed 
all'infinità. Le definizioni convenzionali dei limiti sono 
presentate e parecchi esempi grafici sono studiati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να μελετήσει την έννοια του ορίου μιας λειτουργίας σε ένα 
σημείο και στο άπειρο. Οι επίσημοι ορισμοί των ορίων 
παρουσιάζονται και διάφορα γραφικά παραδείγματα μελετώνται.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Asymptote</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">endlos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Begrenzung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">einseitige Begrenzung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Durchgang</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">asymptote</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">infini</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">limite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">limite recto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">continuité</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">limite su un solo lato</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">continuità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
